title: nAnoru shiru
sahitya:
nAnoru shiru vINai adan nAdamAm uyir nIyE


anupallavi

  tEnenum mozhiyAL shivashakti bAlanE ten pzhanApuri deivamAm vElanE


caraNam    nalla nallishaigaLAi nAthanE varuvAi nAnilam inbura nAn naTam purivEn 
kallum karaindurugak-kanivuDan pADuvEn karuNaiyankaDalE un perumaiyaip-pEshuvEn
